title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1927.5 - Removal from day reporting program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1927.5 - Removal from day reporting program

State Regulations

The provisions of Part 1904 of this Title relating to
removal from TRP programming shall apply to inmates participating in a day
reporting program, except that, only the superintendent of the residential
treatment facility shall have the authority to direct the removal of an inmate
from the day reporting program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1927.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
